alert.note: Alert for Pulaski (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued March 22 at 9:08AM CDT until March 26 at 3:21AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Springfield MO has issued a Flood Watch for the following rivers in Missouri... Big Piney below Fort Leonard Wood -East Gate affecting Pulaski County. ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON TO EARLY SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Big Piney below Fort Leonard Wood - East Gate. * WHEN...From Friday afternoon to early Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, flood waters affect the lower TA 250 Training Area and Highway J east of Fort Wood East Gage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 3.1 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached Friday afternoon. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: If you are in the watch area, remain alert to possible flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
